text: I would like to use logo's from "Font Awsome" (<https://fontawesome.com/>). What is the best place to paste the link to the style sheet in such a way that it will be included in all pages?

So, is it possible to automatically populate an email from a landing page.

So, we do webinars.  Every time that we do a webinar, we fill out the landing page template.  It would be nice if certain fields from the webinar page would populate into an email automatically.

Is this something that can be done within HS?
maybe use a HubDB for that data, pull in both email and in landing page
but the info has to be in the HubSpot contact record first
